sent.orig: The purchaser calculates a loan-to-value ratio using the current, much lower value of the house.
sent.trans: 这个买家会用下跌很多的房屋现值，计算出一个贷款与估值比率(loan-to-valueratio)。

sent.orig: To offer enterprise loan, second-hand house loan, Suzhou loan, supply loan and financing services.
sent.trans: 提供企业贷款、二手房贷款、苏州贷款、供应贷款、融资服务。

sent.orig: Do you accept loan, both private loan and government - to - government loan?
sent.trans: 你们是否接受私人或政府间贷款？

sent.orig: But National Student Loan is a reputation loan all, its business property no for doubt.
sent.trans: 但助学贷款毕竟是一项信用贷款，它的商业性质不容置疑。

sent.orig: Loan sales, loss of interest owing on the loan?
sent.trans: 贷款买房，提前还贷损失利息吗？
